about_the_game:
Join the ultimate showdown in Brawl Squad X: Battle Arena, a fast-paced, top-down multiplayer shooter that brings the chaos of combat to life! Dive into exciting PvP action with friends or take on AI Bots in a variety of dynamic game modes. Whether you're battling it out in 5v5, 4v4, 3v3, 2v2, or a nail-biting 1v1 match, the arena is yours to conquer!

Key Features:

  • Diverse Game Modes: Engage in thrilling team deathmatches, or challenge yourself in private matches with friends. Play online against real players and advanced bots, or play solo in an action-packed bots-only mode!

  • Easy Matchmaking: Our servers ensure you’ll find a match at any time, running bot matches even when no players are online, so you can always jump into the action!

  • Character Types: Choose from a variety of soldier types, including Mercenaries, Black Operations, Rangers, U.S. Soldiers, and a roster of WWII soldier types like Infantry, Tank Soldiers, Paratroopers, and Commandos.

  • Unique Weapons: Equip your characters with an array of weapon classes, including Assault Rifles, Snipers, Shotguns, and more! Discover unique weapons like the Electric Gun, Water Gun, and the explosive Grenade Launcher, each with distinct abilities and playstyles.

  • Customizable Perks: Tailor your combat experience with customizable perks that suit your style. Experiment with different builds and strategies to dominate the battlefield!

  • Intelligent Bot System: Never worry about matchmaking again! Our advanced bot system ensures that matches are always full, with AI opponents that mimic real player behavior—dodging, camping, and coordinating tactics just like the pros.

  • Cross-Platform Play: Enjoy seamless gaming across Windows, Mac, and Linux with full cross-play support, so you can team up or compete with friends no matter the platform.

  • Steam Leaderboard Support: Challenge your skills and climb the ranks with our integrated Steam leaderboard, where you can compare your top scores with players around the world!

  • Optimized Performance: Experience smooth gameplay at 60 FPS, even on older hardware, ensuring a fluid and enjoyable experience for everyone.

  • Compact Game Size: With a disk size of only 500MB, Brawl Squad X delivers great graphics without taking up too much space on your device!

  • Multi-Language Support: Enjoy the game in your preferred language with comprehensive multi-language support, making it accessible to players around the globe.

  • Stunning Graphics & Sound: Immerse yourself in a vibrant, stylized world with captivating visuals, delightful sound effects, and an epic soundtrack that enhances every skirmish.

  • Regular Updates: Enjoy ongoing content updates, introducing new characters, weapons, maps, and exciting gameplay features to keep the action fresh!

Gather your squad and prepare for battle in Brawl Squad X: Battle Arena! Will you rise to the top or be left in the dust? The arena awaits!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 200 Series or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable GPU, Intel Iris Pro 5200 or AMD/Nvidia equivalent for Mac
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
